title: Ticket #3533: Modify BLAHP to tolerate status query failure
description: The blahp currently puts a job on hold after a single failure of the status command. Occasionally PBS and other batch systems fail status commands momentarily. The Blahp should be modified to tolerate at least one status update with putting the job onto hold.
remarks:
2013-Apr-09 10:39:33 by dweitzel:
Does this need to be documented? If not, then it can be closed.
